name: MyGirlfriend
0:
”Alexa, ask my girlfriend if I can go hunting”
”Alexa, ask my girlfriend if I can go out this weekend”
”Alexa, ask my girlfriend if I can have more bacon”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my girlfriend
des: Use this skill to get the answers you always wanted from your girlfriend. Just ask and it's approved! You can ask "My Girlfriend" for permission to buy things, go place, or do activities. Have you always been told "no" by your girlfriend? Now you can finally hear "yes" as relayed by Alexa. Watch her stunned to hear Alexa approving things on her behalf! She won't be able to argue because Alexa doesn't lie!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
